name: aws_kms_key_rotation_scan
description: Rotating AWS KMS keys is the process of periodically generating new encryption keys to replace old ones.This is a critical security best practice to mitigate the risk of compromised keys.
success_message: Hooray!!! All your keys are rotating on a timely basis.
failure_message: Oh Snap!!! Some of your keys are not rotated on a timely basis. You need to fix this ASAP! Check metadata for more insights.
